description:
Kemi Badenoch has branded David Tennant a "rich, Lefty, white male celebrity" after he said he wished she "did not exist any more" because of her views on transgenderism and women’s rights.

The post Kemi Badenoch Brands David Tennant “Rich, Lefty, White Male Celebrity” in Trans Row appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Kemi Badenoch Brands David Tennant “Rich, Lefty, White Male Celebrity” in Trans Row

description:
Was the global overreaction to Covid merely panic or were there vested interests and authoritarian ideologies pushing the hysteria? Alex Kriel follows the money as he asks, cui bono?

The post The Great Lockdown Swindle appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The Great Lockdown Swindle

description:
A staggering £1.4bn in PPE has been destroyed or written off in the most wasteful Government deal of the pandemic.

The post Government Destroys £1.4bn of PPE From One Covid Deal appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Government Destroys £1.4bn of PPE From One Covid Deal

description:
The Tory election campaign is like one of those England batting collapses – paradoxically both distressing and enjoyable in equal measure, says Sean Walsh. The problem is the party has forgotten how to be conservative.

The post The Tory Party’s Puzzling Indifference to the Benefits of Conservatism appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: The Tory Party’s Puzzling Indifference to the Benefits of Conservatism

description:
Owners of electric cars are ditching battery power and returning to petrol as industry data show that a majority of those who sell an EV don't buy a new one.

The post Electric Vehicle Owners Ditch Battery Power as Majority Selling an EV Return to Petrol appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Electric Vehicle Owners Ditch Battery Power as Majority Selling an EV Return to Petrol

description:
The mounting evidence of harms from lockdowns and vaccines has swelled the ranks of the sceptics. But principled opposition to coercion doesn't depend on efficacy or safety, says Nick Rendell.

The post Principled Opposition to Lockdown and Vaccine Coercion appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Principled Opposition to Lockdown and Vaccine Coercion

description:
Pfizer is being sued again by U.S. states over false statements about its COVID-19 vaccine. But why is BioNTech not also in the frame, asks Robert Kogon. After all, it is the true owner and creator of the mRNA jab.

The post Pfizer Gets Sued Again. Why Is BioNTech Escaping Justice? appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: Pfizer Gets Sued Again. Why Is BioNTech Escaping Justice?

description:
A summary of the most interesting stories in the past 24 hours that challenge the prevailing orthodoxy about the ‘climate emergency’, public health ‘crises’ and the supposed moral defects of Western civilisation.

The post News Round-Up appeared first on The Daily Sceptic.
title: News Round-Up
